item.title: New blog posts and Meetup talk
item.guid: New blog posts and Meetup talk
item.description: Recently, we added two new blog posts about the verification of the crypto-currency Tezos:

item.title: Verification of the use of data-encoding
item.guid: Verification of the use of data-encoding
item.description: We added a blog post about the verification of the use of data-encodings in the protocol of Tezos. Currently, we work on the verification of Tezos and publish our blog articles there. We use coq-of-ocaml to translate the OCaml code to Coq and do our verification effort.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome to the blog of Foobar Land. Here we will post various updates about the work we are doing.
